reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Great lecturer, but the grading is tough. You really have to put in the work.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Excellent professor! His explanations are clear, and he always makes time for students.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course with a heavy workload. Dr. Zhang is knowledgeable but not very approachable.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and unengaging. The exams are difficult and not always reflective of the material covered.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is passionate about the subject, which makes the class interesting. However, the assignments are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Physics 101
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had. His enthusiasm for physics is contagious.

reviews.subject: Sociology of Gender
reviews.review: The course content is interesting, but Dr. Park's lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Great introduction to programming. Dr. Lee is very helpful, but the course moves quickly.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is an inspiring professor who really cares about her students. Her classes are thought-provoking and engaging.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The material is dense, and Dr. Patel's teaching style is straightforward, but not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and encourages critical thinking, but her lectures can sometimes be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and cares about student success. His classes are both informative and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: The subject matter is interesting, but Dr. Davis tends to go off on tangents, making the lectures confusing.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Decent professor, but the course is very reading-intensive. His lectures are average.

reviews.subject: Spanish 101
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a great teacher. She makes learning Spanish fun and interactive.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Clark makes the material accessible and interesting. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Marketing 101
reviews.review: Engaging and knowledgeable. Dr. Nguyen brings real-world experience into the classroom.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris knows his stuff, but his lectures are dry, and the exams are difficult.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: The content is interesting, but Dr. Taylor's lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: One of the most inspiring professors. Dr. Evans encourages creativity and provides constructive feedback.
